speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Well
               
              have
               
              we
               
              done
              ,
               
              thrice-valiant
               
              countrymen
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
But
               
              all’s
               
              not
               
              done
              .
               
              Yet
               
              keep
               
              the
               
              French
               
              the
               
              field
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
The
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              York
               
              commends
               
              him
               
              to
               
              your
               
              Majesty
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Lives
               
              he
              ,
               
              good
               
              uncle
              ?
               
              Thrice
               
              within
               
              this
               
              hour

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
I
               
              saw
               
              him
               
              down
              ,
               
              thrice
               
              up
               
              again
               
              and
               
              fighting
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
From
               
              helmet
               
              to
               
              the
               
              spur
              ,
               
              all
               
              blood
               
              he
               
              was
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
In
               
              which
               
              array
              ,
               
              brave
               
              soldier
              ,
               
              doth
               
              he
               
              lie
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
Larding
               
              the
               
              plain
              ,
               
              and
               
              by
               
              his
               
              bloody
               
              side
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
Yoke-fellow
               
              to
               
              his
               
              honor-owing
               
              wounds
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
The
               
              noble
               
              Earl
               
              of
               
              Suffolk
               
              also
               
              lies
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
Suffolk
               
              first
               
              died
              ,
               
              and
               
              York
              ,
               
              all
               
              haggled
               
              over
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
Comes
               
              to
               
              him
               
              where
               
              in
               
              gore
               
              he
               
              lay
               
              insteeped
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
And
               
              takes
               
              him
               
              by
               
              the
               
              beard
              ,
               
              kisses
               
              the
               
              gashes

speaker: EXETER
text:
That
               
              bloodily
               
              did
               
              yawn
               
              upon
               
              his
               
              face
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
He
               
              cries
               
              aloud
               
              “
              Tarry
              ,
               
              my
               
              cousin
               
              Suffolk
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
My
               
              soul
               
              shall
               
              thine
               
              keep
               
              company
               
              to
               
              heaven
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
Tarry
              ,
               
              sweet
               
              soul
              ,
               
              for
               
              mine
              ;
               
              then
               
              fly
               
              abreast
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
As
               
              in
               
              this
               
              glorious
               
              and
               
              well-foughten
               
              field

speaker: EXETER
text:
We
               
              kept
               
              together
               
              in
               
              our
               
              chivalry
              .
              ”

speaker: EXETER
text:
Upon
               
              these
               
              words
               
              I
               
              came
               
              and
               
              cheered
               
              him
               
              up
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
He
               
              smiled
               
              me
               
              in
               
              the
               
              face
              ,
               
              raught
               
              me
               
              his
               
              hand
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
And
               
              with
               
              a
               
              feeble
               
              grip
              ,
               
              says
               
              “
              Dear
               
              my
               
              lord
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
Commend
               
              my
               
              service
               
              to
               
              my
               
              sovereign
              .
              ”

speaker: EXETER
text:
So
               
              did
               
              he
               
              turn
              ,
               
              and
               
              over
               
              Suffolk’s
               
              neck

speaker: EXETER
text:
He
               
              threw
               
              his
               
              wounded
               
              arm
               
              and
               
              kissed
               
              his
               
              lips
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
And
               
              so
              ,
               
              espoused
               
              to
               
              death
              ,
               
              with
               
              blood
               
              he
               
              sealed

speaker: EXETER
text:
A
               
              testament
               
              of
               
              noble-ending
               
              love
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
The
               
              pretty
               
              and
               
              sweet
               
              manner
               
              of
               
              it
               
              forced

speaker: EXETER
text:
Those
               
              waters
               
              from
               
              me
               
              which
               
              I
               
              would
               
              have
               
              stopped
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
But
               
              I
               
              had
               
              not
               
              so
               
              much
               
              of
               
              man
               
              in
               
              me
              ,

speaker: EXETER
text:
And
               
              all
               
              my
               
              mother
               
              came
               
              into
               
              mine
               
              eyes

speaker: EXETER
text:
And
               
              gave
               
              me
               
              up
               
              to
               
              tears
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
I
               
              blame
               
              you
               
              not
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
For
              ,
               
              hearing
               
              this
              ,
               
              I
               
              must
               
              perforce
               
              compound

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
With
               
              my
               
              full
               
              eyes
              ,
               
              or
               
              they
               
              will
               
              issue
               
              too
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
But
               
              hark
              ,
               
              what
               
              new
               
              alarum
               
              is
               
              this
               
              same
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
The
               
              French
               
              have
               
              reinforced
               
              their
               
              scattered
               
              men
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Then
               
              every
               
              soldier
               
              kill
               
              his
               
              prisoners
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Give
               
              the
               
              word
               
              through
              .
